attributes.action: Change the saying "get along like a house on fire"
attributes.additional_details: The saying doesn't make sense. People do not want their houses to be on fire and it is a negative thing. I want it to be more positive so it makes more sense.
attributes.background: I would like the saying "two people get along like a house on fire" to an alternative version.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government isn't responsible for deciding what phrases people use and how.
